item.title: Comment #2 on Cycle Scheme by Dave Cardwell
item.description: Thanks for posting this write-up about the scheme—I’ll definitely be pestering my employer to sign up for this one.
item.dc:creator: Dave Cardwell

item.title: Comment #1 on Cycle Scheme by Stuart Maynard-Keene
item.description: Unfortunately this scheme came out after I had bought my bike, I also heard that the paperwork was putting off employers. Oh well, maybe next time I’ll give it a go, might even be able to afford a bike like yours next time!
item.dc:creator: Stuart Maynard-Keene
